Reviews.Title: Good resolution, easy to install
Reviews.Author: Marc Singer
Reviews.Content: For the money, this is a high quality camera that was easy to install and connect.  The mounting bracket is sturdy and keeps the camera in place better than some other bullet cameras I'm replacing.

ProductInfo.Features:
540 lines of resolution
24 IR LEDs / 0.02 LUX (0.0 LUX IR ON)
Dual window structure to prevent reflection and diffusion of IR light
Cable hidden inside cast aluminum swivel mount
Includes regulated power supply, 50' video-power cable and mounting hardware
ProductInfo.Name: Security Labs Weather-Proof Camera with Micron Pitch CCD (SLC-154C)
